html:
Global Supply Chain and Logistics

Effective and efficient global supply chain and logistics management drives profitable business operations. Relationship management, risk management, knowledge and information management, budget management, continuous improvement processes and supply chain integration all form part of this contemporary module.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate an understanding of developments in globalisation within the context of contemporary practice in supply chain management and in so doing critically assess the role of supply chain management as a key source of competitive advantage..

+   Analyse and evaluate challenges in design of competitive supply chain architecture within the context of cultural, ethical & technological evolution.

+  Evaluate future challenges international supply chain management and their implication in sustaining competitive advantage.

Module Content:
